title: Is Pat Surtain II the best Broncos cornerback ever? Four Denver CB icons size up his talent
description: Surtain's combo of size, approach, competitiveness and maturity have the best Broncos to ever play corner bullish on the 24-year-old's future.
author: Jeff Legwold

title: After Steve Smith tiff, Jerry Jeudy trying to prove he's more than 'just a guy'
description: Cleveland invested in Jeudy -- a 2020 first-round pick for Denver -- this offseason, and it's beginning to pay off.
author: Daniel Oyefusi

title: Arsenal host holders Man Utd in FA Cup third round
description: Holders Manchester United are drawn away to record 14-time winners Arsenal in the third round of the FA Cup.

title: 'It hurt I had to leave' - Van Nistelrooy reveals Man Utd pain
description: New Leicester boss Ruud van Nistelrooy reveals his pain at leaving Manchester United but vows to stamp his authority on the Foxes.

title: Live MNF updates: Browns try to play spoiler vs. surprising Broncos
description: Denver is right in the thick of the AFC wild-card race thanks to rookie QB Bo Nix and a sack-happy defense. Jameis Winston and Cleveland can mess that up.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Luka Doncic returns to red-hot Mavericks & Giannis gets the Bucks back on track | Good Word with Goodwill
description: Vincent Goodwill and Tim Cato discuss the Mavericks and Bucks, who have gone 8-1 in their last 9 games, and what's leading to a youth revolution in the Western Conference.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Arsenal face Man Utd in FA Cup third round as Tamworth host Tottenham
description: Holders Manchester United face a trip to Arsenal in the third round of this season's FA Cup as two of the favourites for the trophy lock horns early in the New Year.

title: Slot's title favourites: What can stop Liverpool?
description: The Opta Supercomputer says Liverpool now have a 85.1 per cent of winning the Premier League after their 2-0 win over champions Man City on Super Sunday saw them go nine points clear at the top - so what can stop Arne Slot's side from being crowned champions this season?
